adjectives.description: incongruent (comparative more incongruent, superlative most incongruent)

entries.meaning: out of place, incompatible, inharmonious, not congruent
examples: The yellow blazer was incongruent for the funeral.
Her knowledge of world politics was incongruent in someone so young.

entries.meaning: (mathematics) of or relating to two numbers that have different remainders when divided by a third number
